name: Geoff McFetridge Bushmills Decanter
description:
A glass whiskey decanter designed by acclaimed visual artist Geoff McFetridge and hand blown by renowned glassmakers Esque Studio.  Created in an edition of 75 for Bushmills Whiskey.

Each piece is signed and numbered.

Decanters are shipped empty, to comply with liquor regulations.

name: Simple Pendent Light
description:
Justin set out to design our most affordable versatile pendents yet.  These color blocks come in small (think a few lined up over a bar), or large enough to light perfectly for dining. Custom color requests encouraged.

Design by Justin Parker.

name: Zink-esque Desk/floor Lamp
description:
My carpenter friend was sampling some concrete shelving for me.  I loved the sample so much, I asked him to collaborate on this lamp series.

Design by Mike Zink and Esque.

name: Venom Candlestick Set
description:
Slinky, sinuous, serpentine, sexy.  One stands flat, while the second droops and hangs off a table or shelves edge. 
Set of 2.

Design by Andi Kovel

name: Sakuteiki Salad/Punch Set
description:
Inspired by zen rock gardens, in ghostly opaline, or smoky smoke. Choose a punchbowl set, with hand blown ladle + 4 cups.  Or, a salad bowl set with hollow utensils.

Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Wax Collector
description:
Our unique candle holder has a divet at the lip that allows wax to drip inside the bottle.  This work in progress is completed and colored by you! Fill it up, return it to Esque, and we'll send you a new one.  Buy dripping candles, or it won't work.
10" wide

Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Ouf!
description:
A nod to Andi's grandmother's egg cup collection. Our's has a glass cloche cover, and a hand made ceramic base.  A collaboration with our old studio manager Jill Daniel. Egg not included.
7" tall

Design by Esque + Bella Terra

name: Nest Terrarium
description:
This statement piece takes it's inspiration from the hanging nests of the Oropendola bird.  Hung from leather strapping modeled after the Chinese finger lock design (it gets tighter as it stretches).  Hand cast Brass hook detail.
Small 16" tall, Large 28" tall

Design by Esque + No. 1 Son

name: Cozy Light
description:
Warm up to our knit covered lighting.  Sweater arms are detached and re-purposed for a soft light effect.
20" tall x 10" wide.

Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Asteroid Lights
description:
Enormous blown orbs take in the entire room with their mirrored surfaces.  Lenses are sucked in randomly for an exaggerated optical effect.  
Floor Model 24" tall,  Hanging Model 30" tall.  

Design by Justin Parker.

name: Animaguri Bookend
description:
Esque takes traditional out of Italian hot sculpting techniques, and goes animi.
8" tall

Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker

name: 2001 A Space Terrarrium
description:
Two piece terrarium, fish bowl, or water filled orb. The two forms nestle together, allowing the opening to tilt at any angle.
Small 8" diameter, Large 12" diameter

Design by Andi Kovel

name: Three Chamber Carafe
description: These aniated carafes are a wink to our hippie friends here in Oregon.  The chambers decant wine perfectly, allowing it to breathe.  Ahh, Ohm!

name: Silver Drop Pendant Lights
description:
Elongated dramatic forms look great in a cluster, or standing alone.
Each piece is finished by silvering the inside for a mirrored effect.  The process uses liquid silver nitrate, and when lit, the process is revealed showing liquid smokey trails. 
Choose small, medium or large.

Design by Justin Parker.

name: Lump Bowl
description:
Hollow form is "sucked" in on top into a bowl form.  Sides are dented, and lumpy.
8" wide

Design by Andi Kovel

name: Cheese Board
description:
Miniature cloche covers nest onto a hand worked, natural wood platter.  Each piece is one of a kind and unique in character.
Dimensions vary greatly due to the unique nature of trees.
Small (1 lid) around 14" x 9"   Large (2 lids) around 20" x 11"

Design by Justin Parker + MADE

name: Cloche
description:
Originally used to protect watermelons in the field,  ours is over-sized and modernized.  
18" Tall 12" Wide

Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker

name: Feather Bubbles
description:
Glass bubbles are filled with feathers for this wall mounted piece.  Create your own arrangement.  
Choose brown, mixed, or white feathers.

Design by Andi kovel

name: Plum Blosssom
description:
Evoking Chinese ink paintings, each flower is hand placed on the hot surface.  
Around 20" tall.  Smoke with red, orange and pink blossoms.

Design by Andi Kovel

name: Off Pitcher + Cup 2012
description:
Each piece is unique, with a matching cup that also keeps dust out of your water.
Around 12" tall. In strawberry, apricot, fuchsia, or gold topaz.

Design by A Kovel + J Parker

name: Guilded Skull
description:
Justin hand sculpts this solid glass skull,  gold leaf gives it color.
Around 5" around

Design by Justin Parker

name: Oil + Vinegar
description:
Clear chambered glass, choose straight with jigger, or with a pour spout. and cork stopper.
Around 16" tall

Design by Justin Parker

name: Waterdrop Jug 2012
description:
Our most iconic work, designed in 2000. 
Tops are thick and polished, sides are thin and transparent.
Available in deepest lagoon, indigo, or purple luster.
Priced from $403 for 9" wide to $1790 for 18" wide. 

Design by Justin Parker.

name: Space Mountain Fishbowl
description:
Around 8" x 12"

Design by Andi Kovel

name: Bubblegum Paperweight
description:
Bubblegum pink. Around 5"

Design: Andi Kovel

name: Wall Tears
description:
"The soul would have no rainbow had the eyes no tears" ....or in this case, the walls.  Design your own installation.
Approximately 4" - 6" height.
Sold in sets of 3.

Design by Andi Kovel

name: The Golden Pig
description:
Our pigs are hand sculpted by Justin, each with their own character and gesture.  A common symbol of greed and gluttony, or of good luck, health and prosperity.  

“Dogs look up to man.  Cats look down to man.  Pigs look us straight in the eye and see an equal” –Winston Churchill

approximately 7" length x 4" tall.

Design by Justin Parker.

name: Glass Eye
description:
We've got our eye on you.
Approximately 4" diameter.


Design by Justin Parker

name: Mirrored Skull
description:
Hand sculpted, it's truly mesmerizing to see this piece being formed, blown, poked and pulled into the shape of a skull.
Adult size, approximately 8" diameter.  Silvered interior.


Design by Justin Parker

name: Mid Century Coolade Set
description:
Inspired by mid-century factory glass.  Think Ken, Barbie and friends….only life-size.
Pitcher approximately 14" tall, cups approximately 5" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Heady Terrarium
description:
Stand it up as a clear bust or lay it down and fill it with dirt and plants.
16" length.


Design by Justin Parker + Andi Kovel.

name: Ghost Cake Plate + Lid
description:
Believers may see an apparition of a cake.  Plate 10" wide, lid 12" wide x 16" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Decanter Esque
description:
This decanter makes a statement, tall and heavy with ground glass stopper.  Available shapes are vodka, cognac or tequila.
Approximately 16" to 18" tall.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Blob Bowl
description:
Glass is gathered thick over color and spun off-center.
Approximately 7" wide.

Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Battuto Cigar Tray
description:
One-of-a-kind sculpted cigar tray blown thick, weighing ~15 lbs.
Entire surface is hand faceted and hand polished.
Approximately 10" x 6".

Design by Justin Parker

name: Aqua Infant
description:
Mold-blown plant watering globe.  Flesh colored + cork stopper.
Globe portion 4" x 4".

Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.

name: Acidic + Basic Jigger Set
description:
Hand sculpted oil and vinegar set with pour spouts.
16" - 20" tall.

Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker

name: Off Pitcher + Cup
description:
Hand sculpted pitcher that's slightly 'off' + cup.  Perfect for your  bedside table.
Available in extra light blue or clear.  Pitcher, 12" tall, cup, 4".

Designed by Justin Parker + Andi Kovel

name: Italian Carafe Set
description:
Hand sculpted wine carafe + 2 wine glasses.  Carafe, 12" tall.  Glasses, 4" tall.
Available in Opaline.

Design by Justin Parker

name: Ripple Vase
description:
Glass is blown thin, then heated to the point of collapse and stretched.
18" tall.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: QP's
description:
Mold formed from antique dolls.  Meant to be used as salt and pepper shakers, topped with cork stoppers.
Set of 2, 6" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Simulated Ice Bucket and Glasses
description:
Colored glass chips are twisted and spun to create a faux wood grain.
They're dipped in a thick coating of clear glass, optic and heavy.
Ice bucket, 10" tall.  Glasses, 4" tall.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Spillare
description:
Meaning 'to draw off' or 'pull' in Italian.  Pulled appendage is closed for a handle on the cups, and open as a spout on the pitcher.
Pitcher, 10" tall.  Cup, 5" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Suck Ashtray
description:
Bubble is sucked in to form bowl, then mirrored.  Oversized intentionally.
Small, 8" wide.  Large, 12" wide.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Drippy Vase
description:
Molten glass is formed with gravity, and the edge of a metal table. 
The piece over-hangs at a 90 degree angle, perfect for the edge of a shelf or mantel.
8" tall, or 16" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Doy Lee Bowl
description:
Hand drawn lace pattern is etched through white glass, revealing fuchsia under color.
12" wide.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Shorties
description:
Sits low and wide with an organic, off-center body.
15" wide.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Monoflask
description:
Flasks are monogrammed and topped with a cork stopper.
Monogram choices are: BS, BJ, or FU :)
6" x 8" x 2"


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Leaf Platter
description:
A hollow bubble is deflated, then pulled into form.
24" long.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Reclaimed Goblet Candlesticks
description:
Hand blown tops are fitted to thrift store finds, then rubberized for protection from slippage.
6" to 12" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Someone's Cup
description:
Hand blown glasses with fired on enamel lipstick stains.
5" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Magnum
description:
Colored glass is "post gathered", creating thick lenses. 
6" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.

name: Troll Vase
description:
Mold blown vase.
22" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: .38 Special
description:
Hand sculpted hand gun.
Life size in gold-brown.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Slumped Vase
description:
Glass is blown thin, then heated to the point of soft collapse.  
Available in fuchsia, xtra light blue or orange.


Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.

name: Grimace Floor Lamp
description:
Large blown floor lamp in gold-brown.
The color changes from opaque beige to transparent amber when lit. 
Available with a leather wrapped swag chain option.
20" wide. 


Design by Justin Parker, leather swag by No.1 Son.

name: Sleeping Lamp
description:
Tabletop lamp. Opal, beige, amber, or black.
Available in small 11" or large 15".


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Water Drop Jug
description:
Our most iconic work, designed in 2000. 
Tops are thick and polished, sides are thin and transparent.
Available in gray, smoke, and chartreuse.
Priced from $403 for 9" wide to $1790 for 18" wide. 

Design by Justin Parker.

name: Beaker-Esque
description:
Thick over-sized beaker with drawn labels embedded in the glass.
Rubber stopper included.
Small 8" tall, large 12" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Anatomical Heart Vase
description:
Life-like heart, with ventricles for flower stems.
5" tall.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Prunt Vase
description:
Solid glass "prunts" are attached hot.
Available in indigo, orange, or smoke.
Short 10".  Tall 14".   Medium 12".


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Lace Vase
description:
Lace pattern is etched into black glass on surface.
Persimmons under-color.
Approximately 18" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Cozy Pendent
description:
Sweater arms are detached and re-purposed from discarded knits.  
Each set of 2 will match exactly, otherwise expect variations in knit cozy.
22" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Antler Bud Vase
description:
Hand sculpted, faux-real.
Approximately 12" tall.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Nest Light
description:
Half mirrored over bronze, so the liquid silvering process is exposed.  The light hangs from a leather strap designed around the Chinese finger trap, so the leather gets tighter as it stretches over time.
Small approx. 18" to 20".  Large approx. 25" to 27".  Leather strap approx. 12" to 15".


Design by Esque + No.1 Son.

name: Blessed Lamp
description:
Mold blown doll head pendent.
In a variety of flesh tones.
5" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.

name: Life-Like Predator Owl Pendant Light
description:
Mold blown pendant light.
18" tall, in clear or amber.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Supernova Light
description:
Floor light with leather strapping.
Approximately 30" tall by 20" wide.


Design by Esque + No.1 Son.

name: Honeybear Vase
description:
Mold blown vase.
Approximately 15" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.

name: Dust Catchers
description:
Mold blown into stacked bricks, each form is unique.
Approximately 12".


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Pointettos
description:
Frosted white vases. 
Each unique form is achieved by pulling points onto vase while hot.
Approximately 7" tall or wide.


Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.

name: Bud Vasers
description:
Beer bottles are recycled by heating and reforming. 
12 oz, or 24 oz. 


Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.

name: Blasfemur Desk Light
description:
Mold-blown tabletop lamp. 
26" long.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Poked Low Bowl
description:
Bowls are "poked" then spun open.
Small 14", large 22".


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Xtra-Terrarium
description:
Clear terrarium with a vent hole and cork stopper.
12" wide.


Design by Andi Kovel.

<script src="http://svpply.com/api/all.js#xsvml=1" type="text/javascript"></script>
<sv:product-button type="boxed"></sv:product-button>

name: Skull Decanter
description:
Sculptural carafe. A solid hand sculpted skull sits on the bottom.
14" tall.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Massif
description:
One-of-a-kind mold-blown vase in amber or fuchsia.
20" tall.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Hot Pop Vase
description:
One-of-a-kind vase. Glass discs are re-purposed from studio scraps.
Picked up hot onto the surface.
12" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Diamond Thickie
description:
One-of-a-kind hand faceted vase.
10" wide.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Mercury Drip Light
description:
Mirrored table-top lamp.
18" long.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Knoll Vase
description:
Tobacco, pink, persimmon, or beige.
10" to 12" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Flatlanders
description:
Available in black, white, green, or gray.
Approximately 16" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.

name: Beer Bottle Bottle
description:
Beer bottles are melted in the furnace to create recycled products.
Left over glass from the melt is reformed back into hand blown beer bottles. Labels are recreated using 100% gold leaf.
Available in 12 oz. beer, or 24 oz. wine.


Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.

name: Battuto Thickie
description:
One-of-a-kind sculptural vase is blown thick, weighing around 30 lbs.
Entire surface is hand faceted and polished.
Approximately 10" tall.


Design by Justin Parker.

name: Drawn Vase
description:
Hand drawn image is embedded in thick glass vessel, one-of-a-kind.
12" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Lucidare
description:
Thick hand-blown vase with hand polished lenses.
Available in cherry, bronze, or deepest lagoon.
Approximately 10" tall.


Design by Andi Kovel.

name: Log
description:
Amber vase, formed by blowing molten glass into a hollowed log.
14" long.


Design by Andi Kovel + Justin Parker.
